description: Pamper your face with our revlon advanced facial cleansing system. Our unit comes with ultra cleansing silicone technology, which gently removes dirt, oil and make up. The silicone brush and sponge attachments can be used with your preferred facial cleansing treatment. Spin technology has been known to clean better than vibration. Unit requires 2 "aa" batteries (not included).
title: Revlon RVSP3512 Advanced Facial Cleansing System, PinK/White
